text:
e="preserve">Armen Movsisyan; 13 January 1962 – 21 September 2015) was an Armenian politician. He was the Minister of Energy and Natural Resources from 18 April 2001 until 30 April 2014. He was born in Kapan.
Movsisyan died from cancer on 21 September 2015 in Germany, aged 53.

annotations.surface_form: Minister of Energy and Natural Resources
